title: Episode 195: Brendan Schaub is a Location Shamer

description:
Bobby teaches advanced true-lie technique. Brendan wants to remake Twins. Khalyla is the PS4 of relationships. We talk fatherhood, funky smells, avante-garde dick, and have a heated disagreement about Adele.
